attributes.action: Restrict non English footballers in the Premiership and Championship Leagues
attributes.additional_details:
In the season 2013/14 less than a third of the players playing in the premiership were English. If we are ever to regain our status as a world force in the beautiful game of football the influx of foreign players must be restricted.
The FA has highlighted this problem recently when talking about the frightening trend of non English players in the Premier League.
The disaster of England's performance at the 2014 World Cup in Brazil highlights the lack of world class talent available to Roy Hodgson or his successors.
We must act now.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities.
